85262.魔物を従えていなければ\nここより先へは 進めないようだ。:
It seems that one cannot go any further than
this point without having monster in tow.

85263.魔物を従えていなければ\nここより先へは 進めないようだ。\n<br>\n仲間の:
It seems that we cannot proceed any further without a monster. The companion monster is dead, so let's bring it back to life and come
back again.

85264.魔物を従えていなければ\nここより先へは 進めないようだ。\n<br>\n仲間の:
It seems that we cannot proceed any further unless we have a ''monster'' with us. Since the companion's monster is in a standby state,
let's make it join and come back again.
